header.title: Building the web solutions that move your business forward
header.description: I work with entrepreneurs and small businesses who need more than just a coder, but someone who can think strategically about what to build and why. Let's start something together!

strengths.title: Why hire me for your project

cards.title: Product-first thinking
cards.description: I understand both the 'what' and 'why' behind every feature, always asking 'what's the business impact?'.

cards.title: Full-stack versatility
cards.description: Backend, frontend, UI/UX, API integrations, SEO. I handle the complete picture so you don't need multiple specialists.

cards.title: Marketer approach
cards.description: My marketing background means I build with user acquisition, retention, and conversion in mind.

slides.quote: She was fantastic to work with and she did a great job, plus she was always communicative (and fast!). I’d happily recommend her to anyone looking for a reliable front-end dev, and would work with her again in the future.
slides.name: Amanda Perino

slides.quote: Ines is a real pleasure to work with. Always relevant and motivated, she allowed us to double our velocity. A strong UI/UX designer, she helped us greatly improve the visual aspect of the platform. And yet, it was onthe back-end that she shipped the most. Put simply, there's nothing she can't do.
slides.name: Gabriel Ibanez

slides.quote: Ines successfully combined aesthetics and functionality, which greatly improved the user experience of our website. She was attentive and adapted to all our requests. I highly recommend her for any project that requires both technical skill and creative flair!
slides.name: Raphael Moncada

slides.quote: I highly recommend Ines, a talented and reliable developer! What I particularly appreciate is her ability to go beyond conventional solutions. Together, we developed tailored innovations for the internal management of my website, which allowed me to achieve significant savings, both in site operating costs and in the additional applications required.
slides.name: Sylvain Charpiot

slides.quote: Ines is an exceptional web developer who combines technical expertise with reliability and creativity. What makes her stand out is her ability to understand our needs, work in a team and offer her own creative ideas to improve the project. Ines also has a strong sense for usability and design, which adds real value to her work.
slides.name: Sabrina Trachsler

slides.quote: Having worked with Ines for a few years, I can say that she has a lot of strong skills: Very good at design; has a critical eye for colour schemes, UI, UX; is very efficient with Figma. Great at front-end implementation. Very good in back-end logic and implementation.
slides.name: Stéphane Lafontaine

slides.quote: A very demanding designer. I learned so much from Ines about the UI/UX side of a problem. She has a vision for sites that puts transparency and usability first and does not sacrifice aesthetics. She was very easy to work with, and I'm happy to say she pushed my team to find the best solution to various design issues.
slides.name: Student

slides.quote: Ines gave my favourite lectures and livecodes of the bootcamp - they were interactive and she encouraged people to speak in a way that felt supportive and equitable. She seems like a real expert in the topic, but nothing ever felt like a stupid question.
slides.name: Student
